title: Handle a Backorder Situation
description: A customer places an order for an item that is out of stock. The agent must inform the customer and provide options.

tasks.description: When processing the order, the system flags an item as out of stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies the stockout and places the order on hold.

tasks.description: Check the next expected receipt date for the out-of-stock item from open purchase orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the item is expected to be back in stock in 7 days.

tasks.description: Contact the customer, explain the situation, provide the ETA, and ask if they want to wait or cancel the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the options to the customer, who agrees to wait.
